CustomField.formula:
"Beneficiary Name:"+" "+Bank_Account__r.Beneficiary_Name__c + BR() +
"Account:"+" "+Bank_Account__r.Bank_Account_Number__c + BR() + "Beneficiary Bank Name:"+" "+Bank_Account__r.Bank_Name__c + BR() + "SWIFT:"+" "+Bank_Account__r.SWIFT_Code__c + BR() + "IBAN:"+" "+Bank_Account__r.IBan__c + BR() + "Country:"+" "+Bank_Account__r.Country__c + BR() +
'bank details last modified: ' + text(Bank_Account__r.LastModifiedDate)
CustomField.label: Bank Details
